entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToolbarItem icon doesn't work with MVVM Binding on iOS #20508
  • ToolbarItem lacks keyboard accelerator feature as Accelerators property is made Obsolete in favor of KeyboardAccelerators, which is defined at the MenuFlyoutItem level #20504
  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after rendering 50 Polylines #20502

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    community ✨
  • Revert "Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #20509
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update Cake #20475
  • [net9.0] ] Update net9.0 with main #20484
  • UI Test logs still aren't pushing to CI #20485

Updated

  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    community ✨
  • [Android] Pickers' reopening in collections #20437
    community ✨
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area/testing, stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
    stale, .NET 8 SR4
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3
